messages.message:
Hi team-

Do we have a roadmap item to create a "Business Manager" type role? This is coming from MunichRE where they want to have a set of users have access to AI Hub and be able to view metrics and utilization, but they don't want to give these users an "Admin" role with all the other permissions that come with that.

Is there an existing role or a plan to have one?
It sounds like the Tester role might work for this? Do they need to see org-wide billing info, or workspace-level consumption/automation & review metrics?
Let me get clarity on this and I'll follow-up.
